devdoc.details: This contract allows contract calls to any contract (except BentoBox) from arbitrary callers thus, don't trust calls from this contract in any circumstances.

params.actions: An array with a sequence of actions to execute (see ACTION_ declarations).
params.datas: A one-to-one mapped array to `actions`. Contains abi encoded data of function arguments.
params.values: A one-to-one mapped array to `actions`. ETH amounts to send along with the actions. Only applicable to `ACTION_CALL`, `ACTION_BENTO_DEPOSIT`.

returns.value1: May contain the first positioned return value of the last executed action (if applicable).
returns.value2: May contain the second positioned return value of the last executed action which returns 2 values (if applicable).

params.excessRecipient: Receives any funds left over after repaying, if any
params.price: Sale price of the token, in wei
params.seller: INFTSeller contract that will perform the sale
params.skimShortage: True if any extra funds required have already been Bento-transfered to the contract. Take care to send enough; interest accumulates by the second.
params.tokenId: Token ID of the loan in question.

params.anyTokenId: Set if lender agreed to any token. Must have tokenId 0 in signature.
params.borrower: Receives the funds (and excess if token is cheaper)
params.buyer: INFTBuyer contract that will purchase the token
params.lender: Lender, whose BentoBox balance the funds will come from
params.params: Loan parameters requested, and signed by the lender
params.price: Price of token (in wei), sent to buyer contract
params.signature: (deadline, v, r, s) of signature. (See docs)
params.skimShortage: True if any funds needed in excess of the loan have already been Bento-transfered to the contract
params.tokenId: ID of the token that will function as collateral

params.accepted: Loan parameters as the lender saw them, for security
params.skim: True if the funds have been Bento-transferred to the contract
params.tokenId: ID of the token that will function as collateral

params.principal: How much of the principal to repay. Saturates at the full loan value. Zero also taken to mean 100%.
params.skim: True if the funds have already been Bento-transfered to the contract. Take care to send enough; interest accumulates by the second.
params.to: Recipient of the returned collateral. Can be anyone if msg.sender is the borrower, otherwise the borrower.
params.tokenId: Token ID of the loan in question.

params.anyTokenId: Set if lender agreed to any token. Must have tokenId 0 in signature.
params.borrower: Receives the funds and the option to repay
params.lender: Lender, whose BentoBox balance the funds will come from
params.params: Loan parameters requested, and signed by the lender
params.signature: (deadline, v, r, s) of signature. (See docs)
params.skimCollateral: True if the collateral has already been transferred
params.tokenId: ID of the token that will function as collateral

params.skim: True if the token has already been transferred
params.to: Address to receive the loan, or option to withdraw collateral

params.borrower: Address that provides collateral and receives the loan
params.params: Loan terms offered, and signed by the borrower
params.signature: (deadline, v, r, s) of signature. (See docs)
params.skimFunds: True if the funds have been Bento-transferred to the contract
params.tokenId: ID of the token that will function as collateral

params.direct: True if `newOwner` should be set immediately. False if `newOwner` needs to use `claimOwnership`.
params.renounce: Allows the `newOwner` to be `address(0)` if `direct` and `renounce` is True. Has no effect otherwise.

params.tokenId: The token ID of the loan in question

devdoc.title: NFTPair

claimOwnership().notice: Needs to be called by `pendingOwner` to claim ownership.

methods.constructor: The constructor is only used for the initial master contract.Subsequent clones are initialised via `init`.

cook(uint8[],uint256[],bytes[]).notice: Executes a set of actions and allows composability (contract calls) to other contracts.

flashRepay(uint256,uint256,address,addre.notice: Repay a loan in full, by selling the token in the same transaction. Must be the borrower.

flashRequestAndBorrow(uint256,address,ad.notice: Request and immediately borrow from a pre-committed lender, while buying the collateral in the same transaction.Caller provides extra funds if needed; loan can go to a different address.

init(bytes).notice: De facto constructor for clone contracts

lend(uint256,(uint128,uint64,uint16),boo.notice: Lends with the parameters specified by the borrower.

removeCollateral(uint256,address).notice: Removes `tokenId` as collateral and transfers it to `to`.This destroys the loan.

repay(uint256,uint256,address,bool).notice: Repay a loan in part or in full

requestAndBorrow(uint256,address,address.notice: Caller provides collateral; loan can go to a different address.

requestLoan(uint256,(uint128,uint64,uint.notice: Deposit an NFT as collateral and request a loan against it

setFeeTo(address).notice: Sets the beneficiary of fees accrued in liquidations. MasterContract Only Admin function.

takeCollateralAndLend(uint256,address,(u.notice: Take collateral from a pre-commited borrower and lend against itCollateral must come from the borrower, not a third party.

transferOwnership(address,bool,bool).notice: Transfers ownership to `newOwner`. Either directly or claimable by the new pending owner. Can only be invoked by the current `owner`.
